overview: Performed by:  King's College Choir Cambridge,  Brandenburg Consort  Rogers Corry-Crump, tenor (Evangelist)  Michael George, bass (Jesus)  Emma Kirkby, Soprano  Michael Chance, alto,  Martyn Hill, Tenor  David Thomas, bass  Choir of King's College, Cambridge  Choir of Jesus College, Cambridge
title: Johann Sebastian Bach: Matthäus Passion
